oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (Office of Price Stabilization) - Programs 26 & 27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson radio show promoted by the Office of Price Stabilization. Labelled as program 26 and program 27. Original broadcast date is unknown. Backed by his Brazos Valley Boys of Johnny Manson on fiddle and vocals(mentioned), Billy Gray on vocals (mentioned), Harold Lee "Curly" Chalker on steel guitar (mentioned) and Billy Stewart on bass (persumably, not mentioned).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (00:39) River Road Two Step (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (03:33) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (04:26) Tomorrow Night (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (07:12) The Wheel of Fortune [featuring Billy Gray vocals] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (10:03) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (10:54) Twin Fiddle Rag (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (12:24) Give a Little, Take a Little Less (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (13:44) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (14:43) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (15:25) The Wild Side of Life (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (18:16) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (19:21) The Tennessee Waltz (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (21:37) When My Blue Moon Turns to Gold [featuring Billy Gray and Johnny Manson Vocals] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (23:54) Thompson performs an Office of Price Stabilization commercial break -- (24:43) Remington Rag (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (25:52) Crying for the Deep Blue Sea (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys) -- (28:30) Humpty Dumpty Heart [featuring Hank Thompson voiceover] (Hank Thompson and His Brazos Valley Boys)
